description: Unique identifier for this report layout configuration record.
Language code the layout is authored for, used to select localized report output.
XML content defining the report’s template—sections, fields, and formatting used when generating the document.
Identifier of the report type this layout is for; likely a foreign key to a report type catalog—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the default system/company logo to render on the report; likely references a stored image asset—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the customer’s logo to render on the report; references a stored image asset.
Identifier of the user who created this layout.
Timestamp when this layout was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this layout.
Timestamp when this layout was last modified.
